relevant_findings.eyes: No lid lag or fixed stare, sclerae anicteric.
relevant_findings.lungs: Dullness on percussion over right lung base, no breath sounds; otherwise clear.
relevant_findings.heart: Irregular rhythm, crisp mechanical S1, 2/6 holosystolic murmur at apex and lower left sternal border.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Distended but not tender, fluid wave present, liver enlarged extending 5 cm below costal margin and pulsatile, spleen not palpable.
relevant_findings.edema: Pitting edema in legs, scrotum, sacrum, abdominal wall; mild arm edema.
relevant_findings.neurologic: Normal exam, mild sensory neuropathy consistent with AL amyloidosis.
